name: KUMAEBI_LLL
comment: カンボジア産の天然クマエビ。抜群の鮮度を誇る最高級品を、サイズごとに選別して急速冷凍しました。Wild-caught Cambodian flower prawns. Carefully graded by size and flash-frozen at peak freshness to preserve their premium quality.

name: KUMAEBI_LL
comment: カンボジア産の天然クマエビ。抜群の鮮度を誇る最高級品を、サイズごとに選別して急速冷凍しました。Wild-caught Cambodian flower prawns. Carefully graded by size and flash-frozen at peak freshness to preserve their premium quality.

name: KUMAEBI_L
comment: カンボジア産の天然クマエビ。抜群の鮮度を誇る最高級品を、サイズごとに選別して急速冷凍しました。Wild-caught Cambodian flower prawns. Carefully graded by size and flash-frozen at peak freshness to preserve their premium quality.

name: KUMAEBI_M
comment: カンボジア産の天然クマエビ。抜群の鮮度を誇る最高級品を、サイズごとに選別して急速冷凍しました。Wild-caught Cambodian flower prawns. Carefully graded by size and flash-frozen at peak freshness to preserve their premium quality.

name: KUMAEBI_S
comment: カンボジア産の天然クマエビ。抜群の鮮度を誇る最高級品を、サイズごとに選別して急速冷凍しました。Wild-caught Cambodian flower prawns. Carefully graded by size and flash-frozen at peak freshness to preserve their premium quality.

name: IKA_Openings
comment: 1kg以上の大型コウイカのみを厳選。肉厚で濃厚な甘みと旨味が特徴のプレミアムカットです。Premium cuttlefish exclusively over 1kg. Selected for superior thickness, rich sweetness, and deep flavor.

name: IKA_Ink
comment: 濃厚な旨味が詰まったコウイカの墨。パスタやリゾットのソースに深いコクと彩りを与えます。Rich and flavorful cuttlefish ink. Adds profound depth and authentic color to pasta or risotto sauces.

name: IKA_Templa
comment: 天ぷら用に最適なサイズにカットしたコウイカ。外はサクッと、中は驚くほど柔らかく仕上がります。Pre-cut cuttlefish ideal for tempura. Achieves a perfect contrast between a crispy exterior and a tender interior.

name: IKA_KIMO
comment: 鮮度抜群のコウイカの肝。自家製塩辛や、炒め物のコク出し、ソースの隠し味に最適です。Ultra-fresh cuttlefish liver. Perfect for making authentic Shiokara or adding rich umami to stir-fried dishes.

name: IKA_Leg
comment: 1kg以上の大型コウイカから取れた肉厚なゲソ。噛むほどに溢れる旨味と弾力をお楽しみください。Meaty cuttlefish legs from 1kg+ specimens. Enjoy the firm texture and the umami that overflows with every bite.

name: IKA_Ear
comment: 大型コウイカからわずかしか取れない希少なエンペラ。コリコリとした独特の食感がクセになります。Rare cuttlefish fins (ears) from 1kg+ specimens. Known for their unique crunchy texture and delicate flavor.

name: IKA_NANKOTSU
comment: コウイカ1杯から少量しか取れない希少な軟骨部位。コリコリとした食感でおつまみに最適です。Rare cuttlefish cartilage. A prized cut with a crunchy texture that makes for a perfect appetizer.

name: IKA_MOUTH
comment: 大型コウイカの口（とんび）。濃厚な旨味と弾力が魅力の希少部位。串焼きや唐揚げに。Rare cuttlefish beaks (Tonbi). Offers concentrated umami and a satisfyingly chewy texture. Great for grilling.

name: TAKO_Leg
comment: 絶妙なサイズ感のタコの足。吸盤の食感と弾力があり、たこ焼き、唐揚げ、サラダにも最適です。Tender octopus tentacles with a delightful springy texture. Ideal for Takoyaki, karaage, or salad.

name: Yokowa Warayaki_190g per 1pack
comment: ヨコワ（本マグロ幼魚）の藁焼き。燻製のような香ばしさと、凝縮された旨味が広がります。Straw-seared young bluefin tuna (Yokowa). Features a smoky aroma and a rich, concentrated flavor.

name: YOKOWA_Minched
comment: ヨコワの身に大トロをブレンド。口の中でとろける贅沢な味わいのネギトロ用ミンチです。Minced young bluefin tuna blended with fatty Otoro for a rich, melt-in-your-mouth umami experience.

name: AJI 5pic per 1 pack
comment: 鮮度抜群の真アジを開きにしました。揚げたては外はサクサク、中はふっくらジューシーです。Freshly butterflied horse mackerel. Ideal for frying to achieve a crispy outside and tender, fluffy inside.

name: KISU 5pic per 1 pack
comment: 鮮度の良いキスを丁寧に開き、急速冷凍。天ぷらにすると上品な甘みとふわふわの食感が楽しめます。Freshly butterflied Japanese whiting. Perfect for light and fluffy tempura with a delicate sweetness.

name: YARIIKA
comment: お刺身用のヤリイカ。解凍するだけで、透き通った身の甘みとコリコリした食感を堪能できます。Sashimi-grade spear squid. Pre-cleaned and ready to be enjoyed as fresh sashimi simply by thawing.

name: AJI_NAMERO
comment: 鮮魚を味噌と薬味で叩いた自慢の「なめろう」。お酒にもご飯にも合う職人仕込みの逸品です。Our signature "Namero" (minced horse mackerel). A perfect balance of miso and aromatics.

name: SAWARA_160g
comment: 鮮度抜群のサワラを使いやすい切身に。しっとりとした身質と上品な味わいが特徴です。Flash-frozen Spanish mackerel fillet. Pre-cut to preserve its peak freshness and tender texture.

name: SAWARA_Siokoji
comment: 自家製塩麹に漬け込んだサワラ。麹の力で引き出された身の甘みと、柔らかな食感が絶品です。Spanish mackerel marinated in house-made Shio-koji to enhance its natural sweetness and umami.

name: KOSHOUDA_Miso
comment: コショウダイを特製西京味噌で漬け込みました。上品な味噌の香りと白身の旨味が調和します。Crescent sweetlips marinated in Saikyo-style miso to enhance its deep, elegant flavor.

name: HIMECHI 5pic per 1 pack
comment: ヒメチの開き。唐揚げや天ぷらにすると、海老のような芳醇な香りとホクホクした身を楽しめます。Butterflied goatfish. Features a delicate, shrimp-like aroma when fried or prepared as tempura.

name: YOKOWA
comment: 4kg以上のヨコワ。赤身の清涼感と、繊細な脂の甘みが楽しめます。お刺身の主役に。Young bluefin tuna (Yokowa) over 4kg. Clean, light texture and delicate flavor perfect for sashimi.

name: KATSUO
comment: 鮮度抜群の活け締めカツオ。赤身の濃厚な旨味と、爽やかな後味をお楽しみください。Ultra-fresh Bonito. Enjoy the rich, deep flavor of the lean red meat and its clean, refreshing finish.

name: KOSHODAI
comment: 2-3kgの厳選コショウダイ。しっかりとした食感と上品な甘みがあり、お刺身に最適です。Selected 2-3kg crescent sweetlips. Offers a firm texture and elegant flavor for premium sashimi.

name: AJI_100g
comment: お刺身用の真アジ。身の締まりが良く、アジ特有の濃厚な旨味と香りが広がります。Ultra-fresh horse mackerel. Succulent flavor and firm texture, best enjoyed as sashimi.

name: AJI_120g
comment: お刺身用の真アジ。身の締まりが良く、アジ特有の濃厚な旨味と香りが広がります。Ultra-fresh horse mackerel. Succulent flavor and firm texture, best enjoyed as sashimi.

name: AJI_150g
comment: お刺身用の真アジ。身の締まりが良く、アジ特有の濃厚な旨味と香りが広がります。Ultra-fresh horse mackerel. Succulent flavor and firm texture, best enjoyed as sashimi.

name: MARUKOBAN
comment: 「白身のトロ」とも呼ばれるマルコバン。濃厚な脂の甘みと、とろけるような食感をお刺身で。Snubnose pompano, often called "white fish fatty tuna." Enjoy its elegant fat and melting sweetness.

name: KOCHI
comment: 透き通った身が美しいコチ。淡白ながらも噛むほどに広がる深い旨味は、お刺身の逸品です。Flathead with translucent flesh. Offers a firm texture and a deep, subtle umami for fresh sashimi.

name: SAWARA
comment: 3kg以上の大型サワラ。お刺身用として、しっとりとした脂の乗りと濃厚な味わいを楽しめます。Premium 3kg+ Spanish mackerel. Features a moist texture and elegant fat for sashimi preparations.

name: KUROHATA
comment: 高級魚クロハタ。白身の締まった食感と、噛むほどに溢れる濃厚な旨味が特徴です。Blacktip grouper with a signature firm texture and rich, deep umami. Served as premium sashimi.

name: HATA
comment: カンボジアでも最高級とされるハタ。蒸し料理やポワレにすると、身の弾力と旨味が際立ちます。A highly prized luxury fish; its firm texture and rich umami make it exceptional for steaming or searing.

name: KAMASU
comment: 皮目に旨味が凝縮されたカマス。炙り刺身や塩焼きで、香ばしさと共にお楽しみください。Barracuda with elegant fat under the skin. Perfect for seared sashimi or pan-searing.

name: HIMECHI
comment: フランス料理で「ルジェ」と呼ばれる高級魚。芳醇な磯の香りと繊細な身質がポワレに最適です。Known as "Rouget" in French cuisine. Features fragrant skin and delicate umami, ideal for searing.

name: BORA
comment: 驚くほど脂が乗ったボラ。臭みがなく、甘みの強い脂は一度食べたら概念が変わる美味しさです。Clean, sweet fat makes it a hidden gem. Best enjoyed raw to experience its full potential.

name: HAGI
comment: カワハギ。フグにも匹敵する弾力のある白身は、薄造りやカルパッチョで真価を発揮します。Sashimi-grade Filefish. Offers a firm, springy texture similar to pufferfish. Ideal for Usuzukuri.

name: OKIZAYORI
comment: 鮮度抜群のオキザヨリ。透明感のある美しい身は、カルパッチョや塩焼きなど幅広く楽しめます。Sashimi-grade Houndfish with clean, translucent flesh and a distinct umami. Ideal for sashimi.
